lore: When it rains, Tremors remain motionless, completely relaxed. Unless a defenseless animal is in danger, they will never move under these circumstances. The forces of King Misery could not invade Neralim because the city's commander deployed a large number of these creatures near the walls to make the ground tremble, thus hindering the advance of the invading troops.\n\nA Quarnok Tremor can throw the rocks of its body at high speed, and they often hit its enemies' heads when they stop moving.
menagerieDialog: (It seems to be infested with all manner of parasites. It's so care-free that it doesn't even groom itself!)
(This creature has propped itself up by its arms and is repeatedly slamming its torso into the ground in an attempt to start an earthquake. Real mature.)
(Despite its ultra-punchable face, this creature seems to be especially intelligent for a Tremor.)
(It's gazing upward at a nest of birds that have apparently decided to call its forehead home.)
(It's stomping down with its fists, one at a time. Annoying.)
name: Quarnok Tremor
